flawed_nl_solution:
The second student guessed 800 because 8 x 100 = <<800=800>>800
The third guessed 60 because 800 - 200 = <<800-200=60>>60
The total guesses of the first three is 960 because 100 + 800 + 60 = <<100+800+60=960>>960
The average of the first three guesses is 320 because 960 / 3 = <<960/3=320>>320
The fourth student guessed 345 because 320 + 25 = <<320+25=345>>345
#### 345

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 60. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
